Blazes will rarely drop Charged Blaze Rods when killed.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Comet Berries\\n"},{"text":"[Item Entry]","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\nThese starlit berries can only be picked from Sweet Berry bushes planted within the pale sky mountains of The Meridian.\\nComet Berries have a chance of dropping when breaking fully grown Sweet Berry bushes grown in a Shards biome in The Meridian.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Deep Crystal\\n"},{"text":"[Item Entry]","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\nThis dark crystal glimmers at the very bottom of The Abyss.\\nThe Oblivion Sect once collected and stored it within their Palace treasure rooms.\\nIt can only be harvested using a pickaxe enchanted with Shard Touch.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Dull Crystal\\n"},{"text":"[Item Entry]","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\nThis chunky gray mineral may be mistaken for quartz at first glance. It is found in Crystal Caves biomes in The Depths.\\nLike other such crystals, it can only be harvested using a pickaxe enchanted with Shard Touch.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Gleaming Crystal\\n"},{"text":"[Item Entry]","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\nThis shining white crystal may be mistaken for quartz at first glance; It is the foundation of Crystal Caves biomes in The Depths.\\nLike other such crystals, it can only be harvested using a pickaxe enchanted with Shard Touch.","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Rumbling Crystal\\n"},{"text":"[Item Entry]","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\nThis hot orange crystal shakes occasionally on its own; It is only found within obsidian geodes in The Nether.\\nLike other such crystals, it can only be harvested using a pickaxe enchanted with Shard Touch.","color":"reset"}]'],title:"✦ Report 42",author:"???",generation:2,atrium_infusion_formula:1,CustomModelData:333150,HideFlags:32,display:{Lore:['{"italic":false,"underlined":true,"color":"gray","text":"Infusion Circle Formulas:"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"Staff of Air [+3]"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"Staff of Earth [+3]"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"Staff of Fire [+3]"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"Staff of Water [+3]"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"Staff of Time [+3]"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"Staff of Space [+3]"}','{"italic":false,"underlined":true,"color":"gray","text":"Other Formulas:"}','{"italic":false,"color":"gray","text":"(8 Ingredients)"}'],Name:'{"italic":false,"text":"✦ Report 42"}'}}
